s: I own several sizes of Creative Grids rulers and like the good gripping quality of this brand, as well as the contrasting markers of either white or black to easily create visual contrast with the fabric I am cutting.

t: Amazon.com: Creative Grids 4.5" x 12.5" Rectangle Quilting Ruler Template CGR412
s: I'm a huge fan of Creative Grids. If I had any other brand of ruler, I've mostly replaced them with Creative Grids over the years. When I started, I bought whatever I saw at my LQS, but now I look just for this brand. One reason is the special quarter inch line along the edges.

t: Amazon.com: Creative Grids Quilt Ruler 6-1/2in x 12-1/2in Rectangle – CGR612 – Made in USA, Non-Slip Grip Acrylic Quilting, Sewing, Crafting, Patchwork Ruler for Measuring & Cutting Fabric : Arts, Crafts & Sewing
s: Great size! 6.5 x 12 inches. non slip grips on the backside. clear, accurate markings, easy to see through in order to cut fabric. All my rulers are Creative Grids and will continue to purchase this brand as needed.
